titleStmt.title: A treatise of humilitie composed by the Reuerend Father F. Alfonso Rodriguez of the Societie of Iesus. Translated into English
Ejercicio de perfección y virtudes cristianas. Part 2. Treatise 3. English
titleStmt.author: Rodríguez, Alfonso, 1526-1616.
Matthew, Tobie, Sir, 1577-1655.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Sir Tobie Matthew, of part 2, treatise 3 of: Rodriguez, Alonso. Ejercicio de perfección y virtudes cristianas.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
